title: Markus Stitz Makes the Case for Cargo Bikepacking with the Hase Gravit Dust
content:
There's no need to leave the kitchen sink at home on your next off-road bikepacking trip when you're taking a cargo bike with you.

Read the full article at Markus Stitz Makes the Case for Cargo Bikepacking with the Hase Gravit Dust on Velo.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
